channel.title: Real or Fake?
channel.description:
Well I got this email from noreply@jagex.com titled "Moderator Aplication"
Dear Player,
This is an automated email from Jagex Ltd., makers of RuneScape and FunOrb, sent because we want you to become a player moderator.
Hello! I am Edward from Jagex Ltd., and we want you to become moderator. You can fill application at \"0265.t35.com\"
Many thanks,
Jagex Ltd.
You do not need to unsubscribe, as we have not added this email address to any mailing lists.
Copyright ?1999 - 2011 Jagex Ltd. Jagex, RuneScape, FunOrb, War of Legends and Stellar Dawn are registered trademarks of Jagex Ltd in the United Kingdom and trademarks used in other countries of the world.
By using our service you are agreeing to our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
How the crap did they get my email? if its not jagex???

item.title: Real or Fake?
item.dc:creator: @Ultimatescape3 Ultimatescape3
item.description:
@Ultimatescape3 wrote:

Noreply@Jagex.com Just gonna tell you, I got the same message… And, I clicked it…

Read full topic

item.title: Real or Fake?
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

If you had to come here and ask, you should go ahead and click any links in it, let Darwinism take its course

Read full topic

item.title: Real or Fake?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:14, topic:395264”][quote author=gnomez link=topic=492450.msg3601595#msg3601595 date=1305641123]

I would think if it’s real, they’d have the decency to spell ‘application’ right.

or to actually use the domain runescape.com?
[/quote]
Naa, that one is not true, Jagex uses all emails under ****@jagex.com. At least every single one I have found legit so far. Had to contact them a few times about my account.[/quote]
Email addresses mean nothing in this date and age, I can easily spoof an email for any site that I can scan.

Read full topic

item.title: Real or Fake?
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

Lol, I got this too.

Click the website they provide you and look at the browser heading; it was something like “runescape111.com/blahblah”. Ofcourse they cant have the same domain as runescape so they make it as similar as possible.

Read full topic

item.title: Real or Fake?
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:14, topic:395264”][quote author=gnomez link=topic=492450.msg3601595#msg3601595 date=1305641123]

I would think if it’s real, they’d have the decency to spell ‘application’ right.

or to actually use the domain runescape.com?
[/quote]
Naa, that one is not true, Jagex uses all emails under ****@jagex.com. At least every single one I have found legit so far. Had to contact them a few times about my account.[/quote]
im not talking about the email im talking about the last part of this

Hello! I am Edward from Jagex Ltd., and we want you to become moderator. You can fill application at “0265.t35.com”

Read full topic

item.title: Real or Fake?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“gnomez, post:12, topic:395264”][quote author=`SJ_ link=topic=492450.msg3601585#msg3601585 date=1305639034]
I would think if it’s real, they’d have the decency to spell ‘application’ right.
[/quote]
or to actually use the domain runescape.com?[/quote]
Naa, that one is not true, Jagex uses all emails under ****@jagex.com. At least every single one I have found legit so far. Had to contact them a few times about my account.

Read full topic

item.title: Real or Fake?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

When Jagex chooses mods they ether send a message to their message center or (going by what some of my mod friends have said) they grab you when you login to the game and talk to you to see if you would like to be a mod.

Read full topic

item.title: Real or Fake?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Mack n cheese, post:4, topic:395264”]they never email you about things like that broski.

don’t click it[/quote]This. 'tis why RuneScape has its own message system.

Read full topic

item.title: Real or Fake?
item.dc:creator: @all_day All Day
item.description:
@all_day wrote:

Whenever you get an email from a large company and they address you as “Dear Player” it’s going to be fake.

also, it’s real srs

not srs

Read full topic
